1. Pfizer to discontinue its GLP-1 pill for obesity due to liver toxicity  statnews.com
  2. Pfizer scraps daily weight loss pill after liver injury in one patient  CNBC

  4. Pfizer discontinues its experimental GLP-1 pill  statnews.com
  5. Pfizer Abandons Obesity Pill After Liver Injury in Setback  Bloomberg.com

item.title: Ex-LSU receiver Kyren Lacy died in an apparent suicide during a police chase, authorities say - NBC News
item.description:
1. Ex-LSU receiver Kyren Lacy died in an apparent suicide during a police chase, authorities say  NBC News
  2. Officials: Ex-LSU WR Lacy died in apparent suicide  ESPN
  3. Kyren Lacy’s Father Writes Emotional Statement After NFL Draft Prospect’s Death at 24: ‘This Will Never Get Easier'  People.com
  4. Kyren Lacy died of self-inflicted gunshot wound during police pursuit  NBC Sports
  5. Detroit Lions CB Amik Robertson shares text messages to Kyren Lacy before death  Detroit Free Press
